snippet.title: Game Boy Longplay [398] Taiyou no Yuusha Fighbird GB (JP)
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: Reinc

Taiyou no Yuusha Fighbird GB ("The Brave of Sun Fighbird GB") is a vertical-scrolling shoot'em up by Irem. It was released only in Japan on December 20, 1991. It is based on the TV anime series Taiyou no Yuusha Fighbird.

Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
